name: Lost in Mars (FancyRat)
description:
IN ENGLISH:

This is a tech demo about a golden robot lost in Mars.

I made it to demonstrate the capacities of Unreal Engine 4 and to demonstrate that even if Unreal Engine 5 is cool, is too much for a normal PC.

btw, this game is speedrun-able sooo yknow what that means...

IN SPANISH:

Esto es solo una demo técnica de un robot de oro que se pierde en Marte.

Lo hice para demostrar las capacidades técnicas de Unreal Engine 4 y demostrar que aunque Unreal Engine 5 es muy bueno, es demasiado para un/una PC normal.
